publisher.publisher-name: Society of Architectural Historians of Great Britain

title-group.article-title: Architectural History and the Colonial Question: Casablanca, Algiers and Beyond

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2006 Society of Architectural Historians of Great Britain and Authors
